title: Two-Tone Brown & Grey Tailored Midi Dress
image_prompt: high-resolution flat-lay product render of a tailored midi dress, color-blocked in warm chocolate brown and cool slate grey, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching, subtle darts, concealed zipper at back, short sleeves, round neckline, mid-calf length, clean hems, no model, no mannequin
techpack: Tailored midi dress with fit-and-flare silhouette, constructed from cotton sateen with polyester lining. Color-blocked panels in brown and grey, short sleeves, round neckline, concealed zipper at back, mid-calf length. Clean finished hems and topstitch detailing for durability.
provenance: Designed by combining trending brown and grey color palette for commercial-ready apparel.
design_text:
Two-Tone Brown & Grey Tailored Midi Dress (BRGR-001)
Colors: chocolate brown, slate grey, warm taupe
Fabrics: cotton sateen, polyester blend lining
Prints/Patterns: none
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: fit-and-flare
Sleeves: short sleeves
Neckline: round neckline
Length: midi
Style / Fit: t, a, i, l, o, r, e, d,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: concealed back zipper, color-block paneling, topstitch detailing
